This weird seven parts nunchaku is the signature weapon of the Aeon Chapter. Each rod is magnetically linked to the other, and one needs to atone with the full set to be able to use it. If not, it's only a rod of seven parts. The black market value is low due to the lack of people able to use it as a weapon.
